=== Hardware details ===

* Toshiba Satellite L25-SP141
* Intel Celeron M 390 1.7GHz, 1MB L2, 400Mhz FSB
* 512MB DD2 SDRAM
* 60GB HDD 5400 RPM
* DVD/CD-RW Combo Drive
* 15" XGA TFT Screen
* ATI Radeon X200M 32MB-64-MB-128MB shared memory
* 56k Modem
* LAN (8139too)
* WLAN (Atheros 802.11 b/g)
* Synaptics Touchpad
* ES Keyboard

==== Notes ====

* Has a killswitch at the front to toggle WLAN.

=== Post-Installation Notes (Ubuntu 6.06 LTS) ===

* Installed via Ubiquity.
* Installed using 'Alternate CD'.
